column5: Description
Create, edit, and allocate new tenant instances through Super Admin console.
Disable or delete tenants with cascade operations to remove all associated data.
Access tenant systems for configuration checking and customer support operations.
Super Admin login functionality and profile management with elevated permissions.
System-wide user roles and permissions management across all tenants.
Configure system-wide authentication settings including SSO providers and security policies.
Comprehensive database design including common tables and schema review.
Platform-wide monitoring, performance analytics, and system health tracking.
Automated backup systems and disaster recovery procedures for platform data.
Users log in to the system using email address and password. Supports 2FA (SMS/Email/App-based). Details: Google/Microsoft SSO integration, role-based access control after login.
Safe logout from system and end session.
Password reset procedure when forgotten. Send reset link via email.
Interface for setting up and managing 2FA using authenticator app.
Single sign-on using Google or Microsoft account. Details: 2FA and security rules depend on external provider.
Display logo, colors, and branding information of current tenant. Retrieved dynamically via API.
Tenant admin uploads logo, selects colors, and configures branding.
Tenant-specific landing page. Basic setup based on template.
Public website. Tenant information and service introduction.
Creating, reading, updating, deleting quotes with status tracking.
Managing quote line items including products, services, pricing, and quantities.
Automated workflow logic for quote status changes (Draft → Sent → Approved → Rejected).
Intuitive drag-and-drop interface for creating professional quotes with templates.
Integrated product catalog search with external supplier API integration for pricing.
Dashboard for managing all quotes with filtering, sorting, and bulk operations.
Multi-channel quote delivery with formatted email templates and plain text SMS/WhatsApp.
Scheduled automated reminders for pending quotes and follow-ups.
Role-based quote assignment system (Admins assign, Staff view assigned quotes only).
Automatic calendar blocking when quotes are approved to prevent double-booking.
Interactive calendar showing quotes, appointments, and work schedules with conflict detection.

column4: Job Creation from Approved Quote API
column5: Automatic job creation and scheduling when quotes are approved by clients.

column4: Work Details and Staff Assignment API
column5: API for assigning staff to jobs with skill matching and availability checking.
Comprehensive job page with status updates, file attachments, and progress tracking.
Mobile/web interface for staff to check-in/out of jobs with time tracking (location optional).
API for staff to submit timesheets with automatic calculation of hours and breaks.
User-friendly interface for entering work hours, breaks, and job details.
Admin interface for approving timesheets and viewing attendance records by staff member.
Secure Stripe integration for credit card processing and direct debit payments.
PayPal gateway integration with fraud protection and buyer/seller protection.
Mobile wallet integration for seamless checkout experience.
Real-time webhook notifications for payment status updates and failed transactions.
Processing affiliate commissions and partner payment calculations.
Interface for creating payment requests with approval workflows and due dates.
Wizard for connecting and configuring payment gateways with API key management.
Real-time dashboard showing payment status, transaction history, and reconciliation.
OAuth 2.0 authentication and connection setup with Xero accounting software.
Automated synchronization of invoices, payments, and expenses with Xero.
OAuth 2.0 authentication and connection setup with QuickBooks.
Automated synchronization of financial data with QuickBooks.
OAuth 2.0 authentication and connection setup with MYOB.
Automated synchronization of accounting data with MYOB.
Step-by-step wizard for connecting and configuring accounting software integrations.
Sync financial data from connected accounting software including payroll information.
Retrieve and calculate salary summaries for payroll reporting.
Retrieve profit and loss data from accounting software for financial reporting.
Interactive dashboard displaying salary summaries, overtime, and payroll costs.
Financial reporting interface showing profit/loss statements and key financial metrics.
Configuration interface for setting payroll data synchronization frequency.
Sending and receiving emails with threading and conversation management.
Sending and receiving SMS messages with delivery tracking and responses.
WhatsApp messaging with rich media support and conversation management.
Configuration for receiving customer inquiries through multiple communication channels.
Setting up quick response templates and canned responses.
Interface for scheduling recurring communications and automated messaging.
Unified interface for managing conversations across email, SMS, and WhatsApp channels.
Automated logic for sending recurring messages based on tenant-defined schedules.
Rule-based system for automatic responses to common customer inquiries.
Interface for creating and managing automated response rules using templates.
User interface for selecting and sending quick response templates.

column4: Fast Quote Management in Chat Interface
column5: Integrated quote management within chat interface for quick quote creation and updates.
Configure maximum number of simultaneous bookings per time slot or job type.
Updated scheduling logic to enforce concurrent booking limits and prevent overbooking.

column4: Visual Indicator for Full Time Slots
column5: Visual indicators on calendar showing when time slots reach booking capacity.
Google Maps integration for calculating travel distances and times between job locations.
Automatic validation of travel time between jobs when creating new bookings.
Intelligent booking system that blocks conflicting appointments or suggests optimal times.
Dynamic adjustment of available time slots based on calculated travel times.
Override capability for managers to bypass travel time restrictions when necessary.
Storage system for job addresses with geocoding for accurate distance calculations.
Calendar interface showing travel times between jobs with conflict warnings.

column1: J.Social Media & Digital Ads Integration with AI

column5: Direct Facebook API integration for posting, engagement tracking, and social media management.
Instagram API integration for content posting, story management, and engagement analytics.
TikTok API integration for video content creation and social media marketing campaigns.
LinkedIn API integration for professional networking, content sharing, and B2B marketing.
Google Ads API integration for managing paid search and display advertising campaigns.
AI-powered generation of compelling advertising copy and marketing content using ML algorithms.
Automated content scheduling and cross-platform posting to social media channels.
Analytics dashboard for tracking social media engagement, reach, and campaign performance.
Uploading receipt and vehicle meter images from mobile devices and web interface.
Third-party OCR service integration using OpenAI GPT for text extraction from images.
AI-powered logic for automatically categorizing expenses and reading odometer values.
Reviewing and manually correcting AI-extracted invoice and mileage data.
Automated synchronization of classified costs with connected accounting systems.
User interface for reviewing AI-processed images and approving data before accounting sync.
Dashboard for managing expense categories, approval workflows, and accounting integration.
